itemDescription: former English cricketer and field hockey player (born 1934)

wikipedia_page.main: Charles Ian McMillan Jones, FRSA (born 11 October 1934) is an English sportsman and academic who served as teacher and educational administrator from 1960 to 1997. He played cricket between 1959 and 1969, including the 1969 Gillette Cup and was also an Olympic field hockey player, representing Britain at the 1960 and the 1964 Summer Olympics.
